properties.entry: Insert Into emp_info ( emp_id , emp_password , emp_name , phone , email , department_code , position_code , emp_identification , payment_code ) Values ( ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE emp_info SET emp_id=? , emp_password=? , emp_name=? , phone=? , email=? , department_code=? , position_code=? , emp_identification=? WHERE payment_code=?
UPDATE attendance_record SET attendance_code=? , emp_id=? , arrival_at_work=? , leave_work=? , late_work=? , vacation=? WHERE day_off=?
